description: This is a product layout view in an ecommerce. It has several sample images that you can click to view in detail. It also features a field to add the quantity of the product, which will be displayed in the cart with its respective value. You can add more products or remove the item.

It is a web page, which is built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The website allows you to search for Pok√©mon by name or number, and the information displayed is obtained dynamically from the PokeAPI.

This is a travel agency website layout. It has a header with a logo, navigation menu, and a search bar. The main content area displays a list of destinations, with each destination having a title, image, and description. The footer contains social media icons and copyright information.
